message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to own something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to offer $900000 for it.
I understand you think the product is pricey, but I believe it's worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $1100000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to offer $950000 for the product.
I'm not willing to go much lower than my previous offer, but I'm willing to make a compromise. I'll sell it to you for $1050000, which is still a good deal considering the product's value.
I understand you're trying to find a compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to offer $980000 for the product.
